positron.mcp.enable.description: Enable the experimental Positron MCP server (requires restart).

positron.mcp.logLevel.description: Set the log level for the Positron MCP server. Higher verbosity levels provide more detailed debugging information. Requires restart to take effect.
enumDescriptions: Log errors, warnings, and informational messages (default)
Log detailed debugging information including request/response data
Log everything including internal trace information

positron.mcp.security.enableCors.description: Enable CORS headers for browser-based clients. When enabled, only requests from allowed origins will be accepted.

positron.mcp.security.allowedOrigins.description: List of allowed CORS origins. Use wildcards (*) for port matching. Only localhost is allowed by default for security.

positron.mcp.security.enableRequestValid.description: Enable request validation to ensure proper JSON-RPC format and size limits.

positron.mcp.security.maxRequestSize.description: Maximum request body size in bytes (default: 1MB).

positron.mcp.security.enableAuditLogging.description: Enable audit logging for all MCP requests and security events.

positron.mcp.security.requireUserConsent.description: Require user consent before executing code from AI assistants.

positron.mcp.security.enableRateLimiting.description: Enable rate limiting to prevent abuse.

positron.mcp.security.rateLimitWindow.description: Rate limit window in milliseconds (default: 1 minute).

positron.mcp.security.maxRequestsPerWind.description: Maximum number of requests allowed per rate limit window.
